mapper.select: SELECT HOTEL_ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, FAX, RATE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM HOTEL
SELECT HOTEL_ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, FAX, RATE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_ID = #{hotelId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTEL (HOTEL_ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, FAX, RATE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, DESCRIPTION) VALUES ( #{hotelId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{rate}, #{localCurrencyCode}, #{description} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HOTEL SET NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, FAX = #{fax}, RATE = #{rate}, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE = #{localCurrencyCode}, DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE ID = #{hotelId}
